mean_cn: n.智慧，学问；明智，正确判断
mean_en: the ability to make sensible decisions and give good advice because of the experience and knowledge that you have; the knowledge that a society or culture has gained over a long period of time
sentence: Zhuge Liang is an example of wisdom.
word_etyma: wis=wise智慧的 + dom状态或领域 → wisdom智慧
